plot: Jenn confronts Tamra about the background check. Shannon meets her daughters while Heather faces rumors involving her kids. Tamra reveals Shannon had damning info on Gina for last year's reunion.

Jenn demands answers about the background check on Ryan, but Tamra explains the twisted truth as Shannon departs from the group to meet up with her daughters. Heather learns that Katie is spreading rumors about her that involve the kids. After the ladies explore the English countryside, Gina becomes collateral damage when Tamra reveals that Shannon allegedly had damning info about Gina to expose at last year's reunion.
